Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.browser

Class WireConnectionLine

java.lang.Object
io.qt.internal.QtJambiObject
io.qt.QtObject
io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsLineItem
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.browser.WireConnectionLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.qt.QtObjectInterface, io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsItem
public class WireConnectionLine extends io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsLineItem
This class is used with the DeviceBrowser to draw wire connections on the array of tiles.
Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Nov 26, 2010

    • WireConnectionLine

      public WireConnectionLine(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, TileScene scene, Tile tile, int wire)
      Creates a new wire connection line.
      Parameters:
      x1 - Starting X coordinate.
      y1 - Starting Y coordinate.
      x2 - Ending X coordinate.
      y2 - Ending Y coordinate.
      scene - The DeviceBrowser scene.
      tile - The tile.
      wire - The wire.
